description: Palmolive Body Butter Shea & Almond Oil Moisturising Body Wash for long-lasting moisturisation.  Stimulate your senses with Palmolive Body Butter Shea & Almond Oil Moisturising Shower Gel.Indulge your skin with extracts of Shea & Almond Oil for long-lasting moisturisation. This nourishing formula, with moisture locking ingredients, instantly transforms into a rich, creamy lather, leaving your skin feeling satiny smooth and superbly clean.Please Recycle.  Moisturising body wash that provides long-lasting moisturisation  Gentle and nourishing formula.  Instantly transforms into a rich, creamy lather.  Leaves skin feeling satiny smooth and superbly clean.  Shower gel suitable for daily use.
name: Palmolive Body Wash Shea & Almond Oil Moisturising Shower Gel 400mL
